message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful.
I'm interested in the product, but $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $90 is a bit low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $105.  Let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
